member.name: T:Amqp.Address
member.summary: Defines the address of an AMQP endpoint.
member.remarks:
An address has the following form:
amqp[s] :// [user:[password]@] domain[:port] [/[path]
Where domain can be:
host | ip | name
If "amqps" is specified, the connection uses TLS in the underlying transport. When port is not specified, it is set to the standard based on scheme (amqp: 5672, amqps: 5671) path is not used by the library. Note that TLS Server Name Indication (SNI) is signaled only for "amqps" addresses where the domain is host | name. SNI is not signaled when the domain is a numeric IP address.

member.param: The string representation of the address.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Address class from individual components.
member.param: The port number of the address.

Protocol scheme, which can be either "amqp" or "amqps".

member.name: T:Amqp.ErrorCode
member.summary: Defines the conditions of AMQP errors.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.InternalError
member.summary: An internal error occurred. Operator intervention may be required to resume normal operation.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.NotFound
member.summary: A peer attempted to work with a remote entity that does not exist.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.UnauthorizedAccess
member.summary: A peer attempted to work with a remote entity to which it has no access due to security settings.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.DecodeError
member.summary: Data could not be decoded.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.ResourceLimitExceeded
member.summary: Data could not be decoded.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.NotAllowed
member.summary: The peer tried to use a frame in a manner that is inconsistent with the semantics defined in the specification.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.InvalidField
member.summary: An invalid field was passed in a frame body, and the operation could not proceed.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.NotImplemented
member.summary: The peer tried to use functionality that is not implemented in its partner.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.ResourceLocked
member.summary: The client attempted to work with a server entity to which it has no access because another client is working with it.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.PreconditionFailed
member.summary: The client made a request that was not allowed because some precondition failed.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.ResourceDeleted
member.summary: A server entity the client is working with has been deleted.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.IllegalState
member.summary: The peer sent a frame that is not permitted in the current state of the Session.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.FrameSizeTooSmall
member.summary: The peer cannot send a frame because the smallest encoding of the performative with the currently valid values would be too large to fit within a frame of the agreed maximum frame size.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.ConnectionForced
member.summary: An operator intervened to close the Connection for some reason. The client may retry at some later date.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.FramingError
member.summary: A valid frame header cannot be formed from the incoming byte stream.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.ConnectionRedirect
member.summary: The container is no longer available on the current connection.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.WindowViolation
member.summary: The peer violated incoming window for the session.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.ErrantLink
member.summary: Input was received for a link that was detached with an error.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.HandleInUse
member.summary: An attach was received using a handle that is already in use for an attached Link.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.UnattachedHandle
member.summary: A frame (other than attach) was received referencing a handle which is not currently in use of an attached Link.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.DetachForced
member.summary: An operator intervened to detach for some reason.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.TransferLimitExceeded
member.summary: The peer sent more Message transfers than currently allowed on the link.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.MessageSizeExceeded
member.summary: The peer sent a larger message than is supported on the link.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.LinkRedirect
member.summary: The address provided cannot be resolved to a terminus at the current container.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.Stolen
member.summary: The link has been attached elsewhere, causing the existing attachment to be forcibly closed.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.TransactionUnknownId
member.summary: The specified txn-id does not exist.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.TransactionRollback
member.summary: The transaction was rolled back for an unspecified reason.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.TransactionTimeout
member.summary: The work represented by this transaction took too long.

member.name: F:Amqp.ErrorCode.MessageReleased
member.summary: The message has been released by the peer.
